captions.text:
It's Brooklyn and
Bailey and today, we

are here at the orthodontist
to get my braces off.

-Can't wait to see
the final visual--

As you can see, they
took the sign from my day
and put it up for Brooklyn.

So congratulations Brooklyn
for getting your braces off.

-Now I get to walk
the red carpet.

-Are you excited to
get your braces off?

It's been such a
long time since.

And you're about to
get yours off, right?

-So they are going to take
off her brackets right now

and then the doctor is going
to come and take off the band.

The doctor is going to be
over in a little bit, OK.

-Like, seriously, it feels
like these are now my teeth.

Let's start scooping
the glue off, OK.

-OK, lean and just
keep your mouth open.

-Looks like we go most
of the glue off, OK.

We just got to polish it up
just a little bit for you,

but that's probably the
longest part right there.
Does that feel nice and smooth?

So next what I'm going
to do is I'm just
going to polish your teeth, OK.

Just make sure it's nice and
perfectly smooth for you.

So look at it
tonight in the mirror

and we can always do some more
adjusting tomorrow if you want.

-I can't stand that
part of the process.

It's like your whole entire
mouth is filled with clay.
I'm going to come on this side.

Set your chin down
towards your stomach.

-Were you nervous to
get your braces off?

But I wasn't actually like-- it
didn't end up being that bad.
So it shouldn't be for you.

-OK, what are some things you
won't miss about having braces?

-Picking the food
out of my braces.

-When you have to awkwardly
be like-- and everyone's
-To get things out of your face.

So people can't see you
awkwardly doing that.

Or when you have to pull
your lips over your braces

to close your mouth and
you're always like shut them.

And then when you want
to smile, you're like--

Can you tell us
apart from our teeth?

Don't forget to like,
favorite, and comment.

And also don't
forget to follow us

And we will see
you guys next week.

-Here's Brooklyn and
Bailey in the snow.
And you playing with the snow?

They're more interested in
eating it than playing with it.
Are you going to sit down?

direction of me) towards the window for a bird.﻿

comments.text:
I had braces when you first get them on your mouth will be very dry and 
painful.you might want to take some Tylenol or Advil to help with the 
pain.but when you get them off it is a little painful.but when they are 
whitening your teeth it tastes awful! But it is worth it in the long 
run.good luck to all who are getting braces and don't be sacred be happy 
with yourself that you finished your treatment!

(P.S if you have a retainer after your treatment a tip for cleaning it is 
to us denture cleaner )

﻿

comments.text:
What's a permanent retainer can you still take it on and off cause i have 
braces and I am getting them off in a year and I don't want a permanent 
retainer if that means I can never take it off so I just wanted to know if 
that mean you can take if off of not﻿
comments.author: andrea williams

comments.text:
The permanent retainer is just this little wire that they glue onto the 
back of your bottom teeth after you get your braces off. You can't take it 
out, but it's not even noticeable. The regular retainer is either a fitted 
piece of plastic that fits onto your teeth, or you can get a different 
retainer which it like this piece of metal that goes across the front of 
your teeth, but is also removable :)
